newsitem.title: USA: U.S. wheat weekly export sales highlights - USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. wheat weekly export sales highlights - USDA.

text.p: USDA wheat export sales highlights in latest reporting week:

Net sales of 176,200 metric tons (MT) were 39 percent below the previous week and 29 percent under the 4-week average. Increases reported for Japan (43,500 MT), Jordan (30,000 MT), Nigeria (25,200 MT), and Egypt (21,000 MT) were partly offset by reductions of 25,400 MT for unknown destinations.
Sales increases of 250,500 MT for delivery during the 1997/98 marketing year were primarily for unknown destinations (110,000 MT), Israel (82,500 MT), and South Korea (42,000 MT).

Exports of 425,000 MT were 44 percent above the week earlier and 1 percent more than the 4-week average. The principal recipients were Japan (159,700 MT), Israel (53,700 MT), the Philippines (42,000 MT), Mexico (22,000 MT), and Egypt (21,000 MT).
